snippet: A look at the latest developments as the state awaits new Congressional and legislative district lines based on the 2010 census.
abstract: Update of New York State’s attempts to redraw its political maps to reflect the 2010 census; legislative leaders, unable to reach an agreement on how to reduce the number of Congressional districts to 27 from 29, submit competing proposals for the magistrate to consider; several government reform and civil rights groups also submit proposals.
lead_paragraph: A look at the latest developments as the state awaits new Congressional and legislative district lines based on the 2010 census.

headline.seo: Unmapped - Update on New York Redistricting
